name: WMS Item V1 ZPL
raw_commands:
{% set name_len = company_name|length %}

{% if name_len > 40 %}
    {# truncate to 35 chars and append "..." #}
    {% set company_name_final = company_name[:35] ~ "..." %}
    {% set company_font_height = 42 %}
    {% set company_font_width  = 32 %}

{% elif name_len > 32 %}
    {# shrink to 50% #}
    {% set company_name_final = company_name %}
    {% set company_font_height = 42 %}
    {% set company_font_width  = 32 %}

{% elif name_len > 26 %}
    {# shrink to 75% #}
    {% set company_name_final = company_name %}
    {% set company_font_height = 64 %}
    {% set company_font_width  = 50 %}

{% else %}
    {# original size #}
    {% set company_name_final = company_name %}
    {% set company_font_height = 85 %}
    {% set company_font_width  = 65 %}
{% endif %}

^XA
^PW812
^LL1218
^LH0,0
^CI28

^FO50,40
^A0N,{{ company_font_height }},{{ company_font_width }}
^FD{{ company_name_final }}^FS

^FO40,190
^GB732,3,3^FS

^FO400,190
^GB2,635,2^FS

^FO40,220
^A0N,45,32
^FDITEM CODE:^FS

^FO35,300
^A0N,180,110
^FD{{ item_code }}^FS


^FO40,540
^A0N,45,32
^FDITEM NAME:^FS

^FO40,600
^A0N,60,40
^FD{{ item_name }}^FS


^FO410,220
^A0N,66,50
^FDUOM:^FS

^FO540,220
^A0N,80,65
^FD{% if multiplier %}{% if multiplier == multiplier|int %}{{ multiplier|int }}{% else %}{{ multiplier }}{% endif %}{% endif %} {{ stock_uom }}^FS


^FO410,300
^A0N,80,65
^FDper {{ selected_uom }}^FS


^FO400,390
^GB366,2,2^FS

^FO410,410
^A0N,30,30
^FDNW:^FS

^FO410,450
^A0N,55,40
^FD{{ weight_per_unit }} {{ weight_uom }}^FS

^FO590,390
^GB2,125,2^FS

^FO600,410
^A0N,30,30
^FDGW (Approx):^FS

^FO600,450
^A0N,55,40
^FD{{ gross_weight }} {{ weight_uom }}^FS

^FO40,515
^GB732,2,2^FS

^FO410,527
^A0N,26,22
^FDPACK DETAILS:^FS

^FO410,560
^A0N,28,26
^FD{{ doc.description }}^FS


^FO400,600
^GB366,2,2^FS

^FO410,620
^A0N,26,24
^FDFor consumer complaints & feedback^FS

^FO410,650
^A0N,26,24
^FDPlease contact us on above mentioned^FS

^FO410,680
^A0N,26,24
^FDaddress or^FS

^FO410,720
^A0N,26,24
^FDCustomer Care No.: {{ customer_care_number }}^FS

^FO410,760
^A0N,26,24
^FDE-Mail : {{ company_email }}^FS

^FO410,795
^A0N,26,24
^FDWebsite : {{ company_website }}^FS


^FO40,825
^GB732,2,2^FS

^BY7,3

{% if selected_barcode %}
^FO95,840
^BEN,300,Y
^FD{{ selected_barcode }}^FS

{% endif %}

^XZ
